anecdotes.content: What is bad? everthing that comes from the weakness
It is a great intelligence to know how to hide your intelligence
Man is an animal that negotiates, no dog exchanges bones with another
There is nothing more dangerous than an ignorant friend, a reasonable enemy is better
We should not be offended because others hide the truth from us, since we so often hide it from ourselves
There are two types of lies: one of fact, which refers to a past action, and one of law, which is related to the future
Abandon all hope, those who enter here
Man is condemned to be free
The most dangerous traitor is the one that every human being has in himself
What people commonly call destiny is, as a rule, nothing more than their own stupid and foolish behavior.
Genius lives only one floor above madness
